channel.title: CNN on Frank Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in CNN on Frank Zhang

item.title: Classification on Modified MNIST Digits
item.description: Abstract This project aims to perform a classification task on the modified figures based on the MNIST dataset. Each figure contains two digits and an operator indicated by the first letter of the operation, i.e. ‘A’ or ‘a’ for addition and ‘M’ or ‘m’ for multiplication. Our task is to build a model that correctly predicts the result of the mathematical operation on each input figure. For this purpose, we have implemented a baseline logistic regression classifier, two fully connected feedforward neural networks and a convolutional neural network (CNN).
